text: Vivo Mobile Communication Co., Ltd. also known as Vivo is a Chinese multinational technology company based in Dongguan, Guangdong. It makes smartphone, smartphone accessories, software and online service. It has a operating system such as Origin OS in China and Funtouch OS in worldwide. It has a 40,000 employees. It was founded by Shen Wei in 2009. == Smartphones == === Vivo X100 === Vivo X100 was released on November 21, 2023, it has 256GB storage, 5000mAh battery capacity, it runs Funtouch OS 14 based on Android 14. It has a 6.78 LTPO AMOLED 1 billion colors 120hz screen, 64MP periscope telephoto back camera, 50MP wide back camera and 50MP ultrawide back camera, also, it has a stereo speaker. ===Vivo X60 Pro Plus=== Vivo X60 Pro Plus was released on January 30, 2021, It has a 6.56 Super AMOLED 120hz display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 5G chipset, 4200mAh battery capacity, 32MP wide selfie camera, USB-C, NFC, 55W wired charger and 191g weight, it runs Funtouch OS 12 based on Android 11. == Sponsors == On September 2022, Vivo became a partner of the 2022 FIFA World Cup. On June 2024, Vivo V30 Pro was made for official smartphone of UEFA Euro 2024. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2009 establishments in Asia Category:Mobile phone companies Category:Electronics companies of China
title: Vivo
